text: yath‌ribukārē! niṅṅaḷkku nilkkakkaḷḷiyilla. atināl niṅṅaḷ maṭaṅṅikkaḷayū. enn avaril oru vibhāgaṁ paṟayukayuṁ ceyta sandarbhaṁ. ñaṅṅaḷuṭe vīṭukaḷ bhadratayillāttatākunnu enn paṟaññu keāṇṭ avaril oru vibhāgaṁ (yud'dharaṅgaṁ viṭṭupēākān) nabiyēāṭ anuvādaṁ tēṭukayuṁ ceyyunnu. yathārt'thattil ava bhadratayillāttatalla. avar ōṭikkaḷayān uddēśikkunnuvenn mātraṁ
